comment: AWESOME PROF!!!!Her assignments are straight-forward;if you need extra help,she will help u!!She relates to her students really well and wants her students to improve on their writing skills. Mine did! However, she grades fairly strict on essays/research essay.Since Iâ€™m not good at writing essays,I had to work EXTRA HARD for this class to get an A.
She's great. I got an A and she's really helpful. As long as you go to her for help, you'l be fine.

She's hard. Doesn't tell you what she wants in her papers. I was always a great writer in high school, never got less than a high B on a paper, but in her class I had to work my butt off just for a B-. Very frustrating. Would not reccommend.

Ms. Elliott is a wonderful professor. By far my favorite at KSU. She is genuinely interested in helping all of her students succeed. You have about a week to turn in a rough draft and another week for the final draft. She is an amazing, young teacher and easily relates to her students. Her class is relatively easy if you do your work. HER CLASS!

Very good teacher.  She was extremely helpful with writing papers.  She always gave positive constructive criticism.  She relates to students well, and has a very good sense of humor.  She'll listen to you whenever you have something to say.  I definitely recommend her!
AWESOME teacher! So helpful when it came to papers. Makes it really clear what she expects on her rubrics and gave us so freedom with our papers. I would highly recommend her.
Great teacher. Definitely take her if you can. Very helpful, and she makes class fun by assigning writings that are interesting to read and write. Also workshop groups are very helpful. MUST TAKE.
Grades too harshly on the reading responses which you have everyday at the beginning of class. Overall a nice teacher, fairly easy

She is amazing!!!! This class is writing intensive (obviously) but you can tell she really cares about you doing well. She will help you with anything you need. She is easy to understand and tells you what she wants in the paper. Her class was a pleasure to go to! Seriously, TAKE HER! I would over and over again if i could.

Prof. Elliot is only easy if she already likes you.  I made A's in all my English classes in High School but I can't get even a B in this class, I might lose my Hope Scholarship because of it.  Only take her if you are going into English as a career, otherwise avoid her and save your gpa. She's nice and will try to help you but its not worth it!
Ms.Elliot is really easy. All her assignments are quite simple and I had no issue in her class at all. All you have to do is go to class, do your work and you are good to go. Easy A if you ask me.

Fun, approachable, easy to get along with.  She will help you with anything, even if it's not related to class.  A lot of writing, average reading, but no tests or quizzes.  Don't try to b.s. on papers, she will call you out!

She is very caring and helpful. You do write a good amount of papers, but that is what the class involves. Whats good about this professor is that she is always there to help you if you need help or do not understand and can be leniant with assignments and grading because she is pretty understanding.

Ms. Elliot is a fun teacher. She assigns many papers and readings, but they are all fun and she gives you plenty of time to finish papers. Attendance is mandatory. She posts all grades online in a timely manner. I would recommend her to anyone, she's great!

LOVE her class. She makes it fun and the papers you have to write, although you write a lot, are fun! (things like "Why your favorite bad should be in the hall of fame") I would recommend her to anyone! I'm taking her next year for ENGL 1102. She's super helpful and if you take her, you won't regret it!
